Sentencas: Precursor powders in the ZrO2-HfO2-Y2O3-CeO2, In2O3-ZrO2, and NiO-Nd2O3 systems for components of solid oxide fuel cells have been prepared by liquid-phase synthesis.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We have determined formation conditions and the particle size of ZrO2- and In(2)O(3-)based solid solutions and neodymium nickelate (Nd2NiO4), demonstrated the feasibility of producing nanocrystalline powders (10-30 nm) of tailored chemical composition in the temperature range 500-900A degrees C, and optimized powder consolidation conditions.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Nanoceramics with a crystallite size from 60 to 90 nm have been obtained and their microstructure and phase composition have been investigated.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We have studied the electrical properties of the ZrO2- and In(2)O(3-)based solid solutions and the Nd2NiO4 compound and established the range of their electrical conductivity at temperatures from 300 to 1000A degrees C: 2.27 x 10(-3) to 2.51 S/cm for the ZrO2-based solid solution, 8.91 x 10(1) to 6.59 x 10(3) S/cm for the In2O3-based solid solution, and 3.98 x 10(2) to 5.02 x 10(2) S/cm for Nd2NiO4.
Titulo: Preparation and Characterization of Nanoceramics for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
